author: Bruno Le Maire
title: 515 - Déclaration conjointe suite aux décisions américaines  sur les droits de douane sur l'acier et l'aluminium de  Jean-Yves Le Drian, Bruno Le Maire et Peter Altmaier
text:
MINISTRY FOR EUROPE  
AND FOREIGN AFFAIRS 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
MINISTRY FOR  ECONOMY  
AND FINANCE 
 
 
 
 
 
Paris, le 31 mai 2018 
N°515 
 
 
 
 
Joint declaration by 
 
Jean-Yves Le Drian, French Minister for Europe and Foreign Affairs 
Bruno Le Maire, French Minister for Economy and Finance 
Peter Altmaier, Federal Minister for Economic Affairs and Energy 
 
 
 
 
 
 
In line with the statement made by the European Commission, France and Germany regret the 
decisions taken unilaterally by the U.S. authorities.  
 
As announced by the European Commission, we will take all appropriate measures and respond 
accordingly.  
 
France and Germany will continue their close and trusted cooperation on this matter.
